meanings.sent1: The puzzle became tricklier as I progressed through it.
meanings.sent2: The maze was tricklier than I had anticipated.
meanings.sent3: Trying to solve the riddle felt tricklier than untangling a knot.
meanings.sent4: Navigating the forest at night was tricklier than finding a needle in a haystack.
meanings.sent5: The math problem grew tricklier with each additional step.

meanings.definition: In a more tricky or difficult manner
meanings.sent1: She tackled the obstacle course tricklier than her competitors.
meanings.sent2: He approached the task tricklier after his initial attempt failed.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to catch the laser pointer tricklier than usual, leaping in all directions.
meanings.sent4: The spy moved tricklier through the darkened hallway, avoiding the security cameras.
meanings.sent5: The hiker climbed tricklier up the steep mountain trail, careful of loose rocks.
